Title: Melissa P.
Writer: Barbara Alberti (screenplay), Cristiana Farina (screenplay), Luca Guadagnino (screenplay), Luca Guadagnino (story), Cristiana Farina (story), Melissa Panarello (memoir)
Actors: María Valverde, Letizia Ciampa, Primo Reggiani, Fabrizia Sacchi
Plot: An adolescent girl, living with her mother and her grandmother, will have her first sexual experiences in a heavy and excessive way.
